##### Plot:
```{r include = FALSE}
library(viridis)
library(jpeg)
```

```{r}
# load Matt
img <- readJPEG("matt.jpg")

# flip Matt
rv <- rev(img)

# reshape Matt for heatmap aspect ratio
m <- matrix(rv, nrow = 582, ncol = 363, byrow = TRUE)

# make Matt into heatmap
image(z = m, main="Matt", col = viridis(200, option = "A"))
```
